exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L orH := fol.orH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L andH := fol.andH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L existH := fol.existH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L iffH := fol.iffH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L SysPrf := folProof.SysPrf L : fol.System L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop t : Term v1 : nat s1, s2 : Term Hnv2 : ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s1) Hv : v1 <> v1 Hnv1 : ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) Unable to unify "(fix substituteTerm (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct s} : fol.Term L := match s with | @fol.var _ v => if Nat.eq_dec x v then t else fol.var L v | @fol.apply _ f ts => fol.apply L f (substituteTerms (arity L (inr f)) ts x t) end with substituteTerms (n : nat) (ss : fol.Terms L n) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct ss} : fol.Terms L n := match ss in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (fol.Terms L n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil L | @Tcons _ m s ts => Tcons L m (substituteTerm s x t) (substituteTerms m ts x t) end for substituteTerm) ((fix substituteTerm (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct s} : fol.Term L := match s with | @fol.var _ v => if Nat.eq_dec x v then t else fol.var L v | @fol.apply _ f ts => fol.apply L f (substituteTerms (arity L (inr f)) ts x t) end with substituteTerms (n : nat) (ss : fol.Terms L n) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct ss} : fol.Terms L n := match ss in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (fol.Terms L n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil L | @Tcons _ m s ts => Tcons L m (substituteTerm s x t) (substituteTerms m ts x t) end for substituteTerm) t v1 s2) v1 s1" with "(fix substituteTerm (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct s} : fol.Term L := match s with | @fol.var _ v => if Nat.eq_dec x v then t else fol.var L v | @fol.apply _ f ts => fol.apply L f (substituteTerms (arity L (inr f)) ts x t) end with substituteTerms (n : nat) (ss : fol.Terms L n) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct ss} : fol.Terms L n := match ss in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (fol.Terms L n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil L | @Tcons _ m s ts => Tcons L m (substituteTerm s x t) (substituteTerms m ts x t) end for substituteTerm) ((fix substituteTerm (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct s} : fol.Term L := match s with | @fol.var _ v => if Nat.eq_dec x v then t else fol.var L v | @fol.apply _ f ts => fol.apply L f (substituteTerms (arity L (inr f)) ts x t) end with substituteTerms (n : nat) (ss : fol.Terms L n) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct ss} : fol.Terms L n := match ss in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (fol.Terms L n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil L | @Tcons _ m s ts => Tcons L m (substituteTerm s x t) (substituteTerms m ts x t) end for substituteTerm) t v1 s1) v1 s2".

ctx: intros t v1 v2 s1 s2 Hv Hnv2 Hnv1.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros t v1 v2 s1 s2 Hv Hnv2 Hnv1.

:= fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := substituteTerm (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct s} : fol.Term L := match s with | @fol.var _ v => if Nat.eq_dec x v then t else fol.var L v | @fol.apply _ f ts => fol.apply L f (substituteTerms (arity L (inr f)) ts x t) end with substituteTerms (n : nat) (ss : fol.Terms L n) (x : nat) (t : fol.Term L) {struct ss} : fol.Terms L n := match ss in (fol.Terms _ n0) return fol.Term L) {struct s} : fol.Term L := match s with | @fol.var _ v => if Nat.eq_dec x v then t else fol.var L v | @fol.apply _ f ts => fol.apply L f (substituteTerms (arity L (inr f)) ts x t) end with original: intros t v1 v2 s1 s2 Hv Hnv2 Hnv1. unfold substituteTerm. destruct (Nat.eq_dec v1 v2) as [eq | neq]. - subst v2. destruct (Nat.eq_dec v1 v1) as [_ | neq]. + reflexivity. + contradict neq. reflexivity. - destruct (Nat.eq_dec v2 v1) as [eq | neq']. + subst v2. contradict neq. reflexivity. + reflexivity.
